report.title: Occurrence list for verification
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM occurrences o JOIN samples s ON s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted = FALSE JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON ttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id AND ttl.deleted=false JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttlpref ON ttlpref.taxon_meaning_id=ttl.taxon_meaning_id AND ttlpref.preferred='t' AND ttlpref.deleted=false AND ttlpref.taxon_list_id=ttl.taxon_list_id JOIN taxa tpref ON tpref.id=ttlpref.taxon_id AND tpref.deleted=false JOIN taxon_groups tg on tg.id=tpref.taxon_group_id and tg.deleted=false LEFT JOIN taxa tcommon ON tcommon.id=ttlpref.common_taxon_id AND tcommon.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id #joins# WHERE o.deleted = FALSE AND #website_filter# AND (o.id=#id# OR #id# = 0) AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='' OR #id#<>0) AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date) OR #id#<>0) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date) OR #id#<>0) AND (CAST(tpref.taxon_group_id AS character varying)='#taxon_group_id#' OR '#taxon_group_id#'='' OR #id#<>0) AND (o.record_status = '#record_status#' OR '#record_status#' = 'all' OR #id#<>0) #order_by#
report.field_sql: o.id as occurrence_id, s.id as sample_id, COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) as location_name, s.entered_sref, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type, ttl.id as taxa_taxon_list_id, tpref.taxon, tcommon.taxon as common, tg.title as taxon_group, o.zero_abundance, o.record_status

param.name: id
param.description: Enter the ID of a record to view or leave blank for all records. If you specify an ID then the other parameters are ignored.

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: date_from
param.description: Start of the date range to return records for, or leave blank.

param.name: date_to
param.description: End of the date range to return records for, or leave blank.

param.name: taxon_group_id
param.description: Select the taxon group to return data for, or leave for all groups
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM taxon_groups

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: record_status
param.description: Select the record status to view data for
